sentences: Hong Peiyun (Chinese: 洪珮雲; pinyin: Hóng Pèiyún; born January 7, 2001 in Shanghai, China) is a Chinese idol singer.
On 25 July 2015, during SNH48's second General Election, Hong Peiyun was announced as one of the fifth-generation members of SNH48.
Since April 2018, Hong and her family moved to Osaka, Japan for her further school studies.
